display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 190px; margin-left: 362px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Create a python program "add_thumbs_up.py" that uses the pip package "emoji". This program will take two cmd line arguments: input_file, output_file. Read in the message from input_file, append a thumbs up using emoji, and write the resulting message to output_file.
Create an Ubuntu docker container that has this add_thumbs_up.py script installed at /usr/bin in the container. The container should be uploaded to hub.docker.com so that the job can pull it.
The transformation "add_thumbs_up.py" should be set to site "condorpool" and is_stageable set to False.

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
